name: My first Crappy Game
description:
This is my first time using Unity to make a game. 

3 hours is few time and I wanted to make things that I couldn´t. 

But I learned a lot and even this game is a crappy thing is my baby. 

If you want to see how I become to a Game Developer follow me on twitter @SrThomsen

CREDITS

Character Script made by Luis Navarrete

Sounds made by Jose Antonio Muñoz Lopez @JosephMordrake
